00035 #ifndef PHY128RFA1_REGISTERMAP_EXTERNAL_H
00036 #define PHY128RFA1_REGISTERMAP_EXTERNAL_H
00037 
00038 /* RF230 register access is through SPI which transfers 8 bits address/8 bits data.
00039  * ATmega128rfa1 registers are defined in I/O space, e.g. in gcc /include/avr/iom128rfa1.h
00040  * A typical definition is #define TRX_STATUS _SFR_MEM8(0x141)
00041  * Registers can be read with a macro, but the args for subregisters don't expand properly so the actual address
00042  * is used with explicit _SFR_MEM8 in the subregister read/write routines.
00043  */
00044 #define RG_TRX_STATUS         TRX_STATUS
00045 #define SR_TRX_STATUS         0x141, 0x1f, 0
00046 #define SR_TRX_CMD            0x142, 0x1f, 0
00047 #define STATE_TRANSITION      (31)
00048 #define SR_TX_PWR             0x145, 0x0f, 0
00049 #define RG_VERSION_NUM        VERSION_NUM
00050 #define RG_MAN_ID_0           MAN_ID_0
00051 #define RG_IRQ_MASK           IRQ_MASK
00052 #define SR_MAX_FRAME_RETRIES  0x16C, 0xf0, 4
00053 #define SR_TX_AUTO_CRC_ON     0x144, 0x20, 5
00054 #define SR_TRAC_STATUS        0x142, 0xe0, 5
00055 #define SR_CHANNEL            0x148, 0x1f, 0
00056 #define RG_PAN_ID_0           PAN_ID_0
00057 #define RG_PAN_ID_1           PAN_ID_1
00058 #define RG_SHORT_ADDR_0       SHORT_ADDR_0
00059 #define RG_SHORT_ADDR_1       SHORT_ADDR_1
00060 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_0        IEEE_ADDR_0
00061 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_1        IEEE_ADDR_1
00062 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_2        IEEE_ADDR_2
00063 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_3        IEEE_ADDR_3
00064 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_4        IEEE_ADDR_4
00065 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_5        IEEE_ADDR_5
00066 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_6        IEEE_ADDR_6
00067 #define RG_IEEE_ADDR_7        IEEE_ADDR_7
00068 //#define SR_ED_LEVEL           0x147, 0xff, 0
00069 #define RG_PHY_ED_LEVEL       PHY_ED_LEVEL
00070 #define SR_RSSI               0x146, 0x1f, 0
00071 #define SR_PLL_CF_START       0x1a, 0x80, 7
00072 #define SR_PLL_DCU_START      0x1b, 0x80, 7
00073 #define SR_MAX_CSMA_RETRIES   0x2c, 0x0e, 1
00074 #define RG_CSMA_BE            CSMA_BE
00075 #define RG_CSMA_SEED_0        CSMA_SEED_0
00076 #define RG_PHY_RSSI           PHY_RSSI
00077 #define SR_CCA_MODE           0x08, 0x60, 5
00078 //#define SR_CCA_CS_THRES       0x09, 0xf0, 4
00079 #define SR_CCA_ED_THRES        0x09, 0x0f, 0
00080 #define SR_CCA_REQUEST         0x08, 0x80, 7
00081 #define SR_CCA_DONE            0x01, 0x80, 7
00082 #define SR_CCA_STATUS          0x01, 0x40, 6
00083
